text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump From the moment he took office, Donald Trump wanted the presidency to be grand in its public image — let’s put on a military parade! — but small in substance. And now, faced with a death toll from covid-19 of 90,000 Americans and counting,    1/2
